description: Ambipom is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is the evolved form of Aipom and is known for its dexterous hand-like tails. Ambipom is highly skilled at using its tails in various tasks.

name: Drifloon
description: Drifloon is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokémon. It is a balloon-like Pokémon known for luring children away by holding their hands. Drifloon evolves into Drifblim.

name: Drifblim
description: Drifblim is the evolved form of Drifloon. It is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokémon known for its large balloon body. Drifblim can carry people and Pokémon in the air.

name: Buneary
description: Buneary is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is a cute rabbit Pokémon known for its long ears. Buneary is often seen bouncing and hopping around.

name: Lopunny
description: Lopunny is the evolved form of Buneary. It is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its graceful appearance. Lopunny has a Mega Evolution form with the addition of Fighting-type.

name: Mismagius
description: Mismagius is a Ghost-type Pokémon. It is the evolved form of Misdreavous and is known for its magical and mystical powers. Mismagius is often associated with the supernatural.

name: Honchkrow
description: Honchkrow is a Dark and Flying-type Pokémon. It is the evolved form of Murkrow and is known for its leadership in a group of Murkrow. Honchkrow is often associated with the mafia in the Pokémon world.

name: Glameow
description: Glameow is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is a cat-like Pokémon known for its graceful and elegant movements. Glameow evolves into Purugly.

name: Purugly
description: Purugly is the evolved form of Glameow. It is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its obesity and aggressive behavior. Despite its appearance, Purugly is a fast and agile Pokémon.

name: Chingling
description: Chingling is a Psychic-type Pokémon. It is the pre-evolved form of Chimecho and is known for its resonating sound. Chingling often emits soothing chime-like noises.

name: Stunky
description: Stunky is a Poison and Dark-type Pokémon. It is a skunk-like Pokémon known for its foul odor. Stunky evolves into Skuntank.

name: Skuntank
description: Skuntank is the evolved form of Stunky. It is a Poison and Dark-type Pokémon known for its powerful stench and the ability to spray a foul-smelling liquid as a defense mechanism.

name: Bronzor
description: Bronzor is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokémon. It is known for its metallic appearance and ability to levitate. Bronzor has a serene and calm demeanor.

name: Bronzong
description: Bronzong is the evolved form of Bronzor. It is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokémon known for its temple bell-like appearance. Bronzong is often associated with ancient traditions.

name: Bonsly
description: Bonsly is a Rock-type Pokémon. It is the baby form of Sudowoodo and is known for mimicking a bonsai tree. Bonsly often tries to blend in with real bonsai trees.

name: Mime Jr.
description: Mime Jr. is a Psychic and Fairy-type Pokémon. It is the pre-evolved form of Mr. Mime and is known for miming and mimicking human actions. Mime Jr. often performs in circuses.

name: Happiny
description: Happiny is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is the baby form of Chansey and is known for carrying a Lucky Egg. Happiny often brings happiness to those around it.

name: Chatot
description: Chatot is a Normal and Flying-type Pokémon. It is known for its ability to mimic sounds and melodies. Chatot often repeats the sounds it hears, including human speech.

name: Spiritomb
description: Spiritomb is a Ghost and Dark-type Pokémon. It is known for its unique typing and the fact that it is formed from 108 trapped spirits. Spiritomb has a mysterious and eerie aura.

name: Gible
description: Gible is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokémon. It is known for its love of digging and creating tunnels. Gible evolves into Gabite.

name: Gabite
description: Gabite is the evolved form of Gible. It is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokémon known for its powerful jaws and the ability to use its fins as blades. Gabite evolves into Garchomp.

name: Garchomp
description: Garchomp is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokémon. It is the evolved form of Gabite and is known for its incredible speed and power. Garchomp has a Mega Evolution form with added Dragon-type.

name: Munchlax
description: Munchlax is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is the baby form of Snorlax and is known for its insatiable appetite. Munchlax is often seen eating and sleeping.

name: Riolu
description: Riolu is a Fighting-type Pokémon. It is the baby form of Lucario and is known for its determination and strong sense of justice. Riolu evolves into Lucario.

name: Lucario
description: Lucario is a Fighting and Steel-type Pokémon. It is known for its aura-sensing abilities and mastery of martial arts. Lucario has a Mega Evolution form with increased power.

name: Hippopotas
description: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokémon. It is known for its ability to create sandstorms and bury itself in the sand. Hippopotas evolves into Hippowdon.

name: Hippowdon
description: Hippowdon is the evolved form of Hippopotas. It is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its massive size and the ability to control sandstorms in the desert.

name: Skorupi
description: Skorupi is a Poison and Bug-type Pokémon. It is known for its scorpion-like appearance and the ability to use its tail for defense and striking. Skorupi evolves into Drapion.

name: Drapion
description: Drapion is the evolved form of Skorupi. It is a Poison and Dark-type Pokémon known for its powerful stinger and ability to move silently in the dark. Drapion is often used by Team Galactic.

name: Croagunk
description: Croagunk is a Poison and Fighting-type Pokémon. It is known for secreting toxic sweat and using poison-based attacks. Croagunk evolves into Toxicroak.

name: Toxicroak
description: Toxicroak is the evolved form of Croagunk. It is a Poison and Fighting-type Pokémon known for its deadly punches and kicks infused with poison. Toxicroak is highly agile in battle.

name: Carnivine
description: Carnivine is a Grass-type Pokémon. It is known for its carnivorous plant-like appearance and the ability to ensnare prey with its vines. Carnivine is often found in wetlands and swamps.

name: Finneon
description: Finneon is a Water-type Pokémon. It is known for its elegant swimming patterns and the light it emits from its tail fin. Finneon evolves into Lumineon.

name: Lumineon
description: Lumineon is the evolved form of Finneon. It is a Water-type Pokémon known for its graceful swimming and the ability to create beautiful patterns with its fins.

name: Mantyke
description: Mantyke is a Water and Flying-type Pokémon. It is known for its gentle nature and the habit of carrying Remoraid on its underside. Mantyke evolves into Mantine.

name: Snover
description: Snover is a Grass and Ice-type Pokémon. It is known for its snowy appearance and the ability to summon hailstorms. Snover evolves into Abomasnow.

name: Abomasnow
description: Abomasnow is the evolved form of Snover. It is a Grass and Ice-type Pokémon known for its large, tree-like appearance and the ability to create blizzards. Abomasnow has a Mega Evolution form.

name: Weavile
description: Weavile is a Dark and Ice-type Pokémon. It is known for its agility and sharp claws, which it uses to hunt prey. Weavile is often found in cold, mountainous regions.

name: Magnezone
description: Magnezone is an Electric and Steel-type Pokémon. It is known for its magnetic properties and the ability to generate strong electromagnetic fields. Magnezone is the evolved form of Magneton.

name: Lickilicky
description: Lickilicky is a Normal-type Pokémon. It is known for its long, stretchable tongue, which it uses to catch prey and groom itself. Lickilicky is the evolved form of Lickitung.

name: Rhyperior
description: Rhyperior is the evolved form of Rhydon. It is a Ground and Rock-type Pokémon known for its incredible strength and the ability to cause earthquakes by stomping the ground.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth is the evolved form of Tangela. It is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its long, vine-like arms and the ability to ensnare opponents. Tangrowth is often found in dense forests.

name: Electivire
description: Electivire is the evolved form of Electabuzz. It is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its speed and the ability to generate powerful electric shocks from its body.

name: Magmortar
description: Magmortar is the evolved form of Magmar. It is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its cannons that shoot superheated flames. Magmortar is often used by trainers in battles.

name: Togekiss
description: Togekiss is the evolved form of Togetic. It is a Fairy and Flying-type Pokémon known for its kind and loving nature. Togekiss is often associated with spreading happiness and joy.

name: Yanmega
description: Yanmega is the evolved form of Yanma. It is a Bug and Flying-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed and the ability to create powerful shockwaves with its wings.

name: Leafeon
description: Leafeon is one of Eevee's evolution forms. It is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its affinity with nature and the ability to manipulate leaves. Leafeon evolves from Eevee when exposed to a Leaf Stone.

name: Glaceon
description: Glaceon is one of Eevee's evolution forms. It is an Ice-type Pokémon known for its icy body and the ability to create intense cold. Glaceon evolves from Eevee when exposed to an Ice Stone.

name: Gliscor
description: Gliscor is the evolved form of Gligar. It is a Ground and Flying-type Pokémon known for its impressive flying skills and the ability to glide silently through the night.

name: Mamoswine
description: Mamoswine is the evolved form of Piloswine. It is an Ice and Ground-type Pokémon known for its size and power. Mamoswine is often used as a mount in snowy regions.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Porygon-Z is the final form of Porygon. It is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its digital appearance and the ability to move freely in cyberspace. Porygon-Z is often used for data analysis and research.

name: Gallade
description: Gallade is a Psychic and Fighting-type Pokémon. It is known for its chivalrous nature and the ability to sense the emotions of others. Gallade has a Mega Evolution form.

name: Probopass
description: Probopass is a Rock and Steel-type Pokémon. It is known for its magnetic abilities and the peculiar appearance of its nose. Probopass is the evolved form of Nosepass.

name: Dusknoir
description: Dusknoir is the evolved form of Dusclops. It is a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its ability to guide spirits to the afterlife. Dusknoir is often seen in haunted places.

name: Froslass
description: Froslass is the evolved form of Snorunt. It is an Ice and Ghost-type Pokémon known for its icy beauty and the ability to freeze its prey. Froslass is often found in snowy areas.

name: Rotom
description: Rotom is an Electric and Ghost-type Pokémon known for its ability to possess and control various appliances. It has multiple forms, each with its own unique typing:

name: Uxie
description: Uxie is a Legendary Psychic-type Pokémon. It is known for its wisdom and the ability to erase the memories of those who see its eyes. Uxie is one of the members of the Lake Guardians trio.

name: Mesprit
description: Mesprit is a Legendary Psychic-type Pokémon. It is known for its emotion-related powers and the ability to impart emotions to others. Mesprit is one of the members of the Lake Guardians trio.

name: Azelf

name: Scatterbug
description: Scatterbug is a Bug-type Pokémon and the initial stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its tiny size and is often found in grassy areas.

name: Spewpa
description: Spewpa is the evolved form of Scatterbug, still a Bug-type Pokémon. It is known for its protective cocoon-like appearance and its ability to harden its outer shell.

name: Vivillon
description: Vivillon is a unique Bug and Flying-type Pokémon with numerous regional patterns. Its wings feature a variety of beautiful designs based on its habitat.

name: Litleo
description: Litleo is a cute Fire and Normal-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its playful and energetic nature.

name: Pyroar
description: Pyroar is the majestic final evolution of Litleo, a Fire and Normal-type Pokémon. It is known for its regal and fierce appearance.

name: Flabébé
description: Flabébé is a tiny and delicate Fairy-type Pokémon that carries a flower. Its appearance varies based on the color of the flower it holds.

name: Floette
description: Floette is a loyal Fairy-type Pokémon that evolves from Flabébé. It is often seen with a flower and its form can vary based on its evolution.

name: Florges
description: Florges is a majestic and elegant Fairy-type Pokémon. It is known for its colorful appearance and the different flower colors that distinguish its regional variants.

name: Skiddo
description: Skiddo is a Grass-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a small goat and is often found in grassy areas.

name: Gogoat
description: Gogoat is the evolved form of Skiddo, a Grass-type Pokémon. It is known for its ability to carry people on its back and its strong, nature-inspired appearance.

name: Pancham
description: Pancham is a playful Fighting-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is often seen in forests and bamboo groves.

name: Pangoro
description: Pangoro is the evolved form of Pancham, now a Fighting and Dark-type Pokémon. It has a tough and intimidating appearance.

name: Furfrou
description: Furfrou is a stylish and versatile Normal-type Pokémon with different trims that can be groomed into its fur. Its appearance varies based on its grooming style.

name: Espurr
description: Espurr is a Psychic-type Pokémon with a shy and reserved personality. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Meowstic
description: Meowstic is an elegant and graceful Psychic-type Pokémon. It evolves from Espurr and comes in male and female forms with different appearances.

name: Honedge
description: Honedge is a unique Steel and Ghost-type Pokémon that resembles a sentient sword. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Doublade
description: Doublade is the evolved form of Honedge, now a dual-blade Steel and Ghost-type Pokémon. It wields two blades with great skill.

name: Aegislash
description: Aegislash is a regal and formidable Steel and Ghost-type Pokémon. It has the ability to change forms and switch between a shield and blade mode.

name: Spritzee
description: Spritzee is a delightful and fragrant Fairy-type Pokémon. It is known for the soothing aroma it emits and its flower-like appearance.

name: Aromatisse
description: Aromatisse is the evolved form of Spritzee, a Fairy-type Pokémon. It is known for its elegant appearance and the powerful fragrances it releases.

name: Swirlix
description: Swirlix is a sweet and fluffy Fairy-type Pokémon. It is known for its cotton candy-like appearance and its love for sweet treats.

name: Slurpuff
description: Slurpuff is the evolved form of Swirlix, a Fairy-type Pokémon. Its appearance resembles a pastry chef, and it is associated with sweet delicacies.

name: Inkay
description: Inkay is a unique Dark and Psychic-type Pokémon with a squid-like appearance. It has the ability to evolve into a different form.

name: Malamar
description: Malamar is the evolved form of Inkay, now a formidable Dark and Psychic-type Pokémon. It has a mysterious and hypnotic appearance.

name: Binacle
description: Binacle is a Rock and Water-type Pokémon with a two-headed, barnacle-like appearance. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Barbaracle
description: Barbaracle is the evolved form of Binacle, a multi-limbed Rock and Water-type Pokémon. Its unique appearance is inspired by sea creatures.

name: Skrelp
description: Skrelp is a Poison and Water-type Pokémon with a seahorse-like appearance. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Dragalge
description: Dragalge is a unique dual-type Pokémon, combining Poison and Dragon elements. It has a distinctive appearance with its aquatic and serpentine features.

name: Clauncher
description: Clauncher is a Water-type Pokémon with a crab-like appearance, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its large claw, which it uses for both defense and offense.

name: Clawitzer
description: Clawitzer is the evolved form of Clauncher, a Water-type Pokémon. Its appearance resembles a powerful water cannon and is associated with strong water-based attacks.

name: Helioptile
description: Helioptile is a dual-type Pokémon with Electric and Normal attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its solar panel-like appearance and its ability to generate electricity.

name: Heliolisk
description: Heliolisk is the evolved form of Helioptile, now an Electric and Normal-type Pokémon. It is known for its solar abilities and agility in battle.

name: Tyrunt
description: Tyrunt is a dual-type Pokémon with Rock and Dragon attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a dinosaur-like appearance and is associated with ancient times.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Tyrantrum is the evolved form of Tyrunt, a powerful Rock and Dragon-type Pokémon. It embodies the majestic and fierce nature of a prehistoric king.

name: Amaura
description: Amaura is a dual-type Pokémon with Rock and Ice attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a graceful and ancient appearance.

name: Aurorus
description: Aurorus is the evolved form of Amaura, a majestic Rock and Ice-type Pokémon. It is known for its elegant and crystalline appearance.

name: Sylveon
description: Sylveon is a beautiful and affectionate Fairy-type Pokémon. It is one of the Eeveelutions, evolving from Eevee with high friendship and affection.

name: Hawlucha
description: Hawlucha is a unique dual-type Pokémon, combining Fighting and Flying elements. It has a luchador-inspired appearance and is known for its agile and acrobatic fighting style.

name: Dedenne
description: Dedenne is an adorable Electric and Fairy-type Pokémon. It has a mouse-like appearance and is associated with generating electricity.

name: Carbink
description: Carbink is a rare dual-type Pokémon, combining Rock and Fairy attributes. It has a crystal-like appearance and is known for its connection to gemstones and minerals.

name: Goomy
description: Goomy is a Dragon-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a slime-like appearance and is often found in damp, forested areas.

name: Sliggoo
description: Sliggoo is a dual-type Pokémon with Dragon attributes, the middle stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its slime-coated body and has a unique regional variant in the Hisui region.

name: Goodra
description: Goodra is a Dragon-type Pokémon, the final form of Goomy's evolutionary line. It is known for its gooey and slime-covered body, as well as its regional variant found in the Hisui region.

name: Klefki
description: Klefki is a unique dual-type Pokémon, combining Steel and Fairy elements. It has an appearance resembling a set of jingling keys and is known for its mischievous nature.

name: Phantump
description: Phantump is a dual-type Pokémon with Ghost and Grass attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is associated with forests and the spirits of the departed.

name: Trevenant
description: Trevenant is the evolved form of Phantump, a Ghost and Grass-type Pokémon. It embodies the guardian spirit of the forest and has a haunting presence.

name: Pumpkaboo
description: Pumpkaboo is a dual-type Pokémon with Ghost and Grass attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is associated with Halloween and has different sizes and forms.

name: Gourgeist
description: Gourgeist is a Ghost and Grass-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Pumpkaboo. It comes in different sizes and forms and is associated with the spirit of Halloween.

name: Bergmite
description: Bergmite is a pure Ice-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles an ice block and is often found in cold, mountainous regions.

name: Avalugg
description: Avalugg is the evolved form of Bergmite, an Ice-type Pokémon. It has a glacier-like appearance and is known for its incredible defensive capabilities.

name: Noibat
description: Noibat is a dual-type Pokémon with Flying and Dragon attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a bat-like appearance and is associated with nocturnal flying.

name: Noivern
description: Noivern is the evolved form of Noibat, a powerful Flying and Dragon-type Pokémon. It is known for its echolocation abilities and swift flight.

name: Xerneas
description: Xerneas is a Legendary Fairy-type Pokémon. It is known for its elegant and graceful appearance. Xerneas has a unique form known as the 'Neutral' form.

name: Yveltal
description: Yveltal is a Legendary Dark and Flying-type Pokémon. It is known for its imposing and ominous appearance, often associated with destruction and oblivion.

name: Zygarde
description: Zygarde is a Legendary Dragon and Ground-type Pokémon. It has multiple forms, including the 'Complete' form, which is the most powerful, and the '10%' form, which resembles a cell.

name: Diancie
description: Diancie is a Legendary Rock and Fairy-type Pokémon. It has a crystalline appearance and is associated with the power of diamonds. Diancie can undergo a Mega Evolution to become even more powerful.

name: Hoopa
description: Hoopa is a Legendary Psychic and Ghost-type Pokémon. It has a unique ability to change forms, including the powerful 'Hoopa Unbound' form.

name: Volcanion
description: Volcanion is a Legendary Fire and Water-type Pokémon. It is known for its steam-based abilities and is one of the few Pokémon with a dual Fire and Water typing.

name: Rowlet
description: Rowlet is a dual-type Pokémon with Grass and Flying attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is an owl-like Pokémon known for its calm and observant nature.

name: Dartrix
description: Dartrix is the evolved form of Rowlet, now a dual-type Pokémon with Grass and Flying attributes. It retains an elegant and avian appearance.

name: Decidueye
description: Decidueye is the final form of Rowlet's evolutionary line, now a dual-type Pokémon with Grass and Ghost attributes. In the Hisui region, it can take on a unique Fighting-type form.

name: Litten
description: Litten is a Fire-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a small and fiery cat and is known for its playful yet determined personality.

name: Torracat
description: Torracat is the evolved form of Litten, now a Fire-type Pokémon. It has a more mature appearance and is known for its fiery spirit and strong paws.

name: Incineroar
description: Incineroar is the final form of Litten's evolutionary line, now a dual-type Pokémon with Fire and Dark attributes. It has a wrestler-like appearance and is known for its powerful and fiery attacks.

name: Popplio
description: Popplio is a Water-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a playful and clown-like appearance and is known for its entertaining and acrobatic performances.

name: Brionne
description: Brionne is the evolved form of Popplio, now a Water-type Pokémon. It retains a graceful and theatrical appearance, often performing dance-like movements.

name: Primarina
description: Primarina is the final form of Popplio's evolutionary line, now a dual-type Pokémon with Water and Fairy attributes. It is known for its captivating songs and ocean-themed abilities.

name: Pikipek
description: Pikipek is a dual-type Pokémon with Normal and Flying attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is a woodpecker-like Pokémon known for its pecking and drumming.

name: Trumbeak
description: Trumbeak is the evolved form of Pikipek, now a dual-type Pokémon with Normal and Flying attributes. It retains a beak-like appearance and is known for its powerful pecking abilities.

name: Toucannon
description: Toucannon is the final form of Pikipek's evolutionary line, now a dual-type Pokémon with Normal and Flying attributes. It has a toucan-like appearance and is known for its powerful beak attacks and vibrant colors.

name: Yungoos
description: Yungoos is a pure Normal-type Pokémon, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a mongoose and is known for its voracious appetite and hunting behavior.

name: Gumshoos
description: Gumshoos is the evolved form of Yungoos, now a pure Normal-type Pokémon. It has a more robust and detective-like appearance, often searching for clues and prey.

name: Grubbin
description: Grubbin is a Bug-type Pokémon and is the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has an appearance resembling a small larval insect.

name: Charjabug
description: Charjabug is the evolved form of Grubbin, now a dual-type Pokémon with Bug and Electric attributes. It has a boxy appearance and is known for its ability to store and generate electricity.

name: Vikavolt
description: Vikavolt is the final form of Grubbin's evolutionary line, now a dual-type Pokémon with Bug and Electric attributes. It has a sleek and powerful appearance, resembling an electric beetle.

name: Crabrawler
description: Crabrawler is a Fighting-type Pokémon and is the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a boxing crab and is known for its pugnacious nature.

name: Crabominable
description: Crabominable is the evolved form of Crabrawler, now a dual-type Pokémon with Fighting and Ice attributes. It has a formidable appearance and packs powerful ice punches.

name: Oricorio
description: Oricorio is a unique Pokémon known for its different forms based on different dance styles. It has a Fire and Flying primary form but can take on various dancing forms, each with different types.

name: Cutiefly
description: Cutiefly is a dual-type Pokémon with Bug and Fairy attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has a cute and diminutive appearance.

name: Ribombee
description: Ribombee is the evolved form of Cutiefly, now a dual-type Pokémon with Bug and Fairy attributes. It retains a cute and fairy-like appearance.

name: Rockruff
description: Rockruff is a pure Rock-type Pokémon and is the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its rocky appearance and loyal nature.

name: Lycanroc
description: Lycanroc is a Rock-type Pokémon with several different forms. The 'Dusk,' 'Midnight,' and standard forms represent different times of the day and exhibit various abilities.

name: Wishiwashi
description: Wishiwashi is a unique Pokémon that can change form as a 'School' when it comes together with other Wishiwashi. The School form is much larger and more powerful.

name: Mareanie
description: Mareanie is a dual-type Pokémon with Poison and Water attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its spiky appearance and poisonous tentacles.

name: Toxapex
description: Toxapex is the evolved form of Mareanie, now a dual-type Pokémon with Poison and Water attributes. It has a more formidable and intimidating appearance, often found in coral reefs.

name: Mudbray
description: Mudbray is a pure Ground-type Pokémon and is the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a young donkey and is known for its strong legs and ability to carry heavy loads.

name: Mudsdale
description: Mudsdale is the evolved form of Mudbray, now a pure Ground-type Pokémon. It has a robust and powerful appearance, often used for heavy-duty labor.

name: Dewpider
description: Dewpider is a dual-type Pokémon with Water and Bug attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It has an aquatic spider-like appearance.

name: Araquanid
description: Araquanid is the evolved form of Dewpider, now a dual-type Pokémon with Water and Bug attributes. It has a formidable and arachnid appearance.

name: Fomantis
description: Fomantis is a pure Grass-type Pokémon and is the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its leafy appearance and photosynthesis abilities.

name: Lurantis
description: Lurantis is the evolved form of Fomantis, now a pure Grass-type Pokémon. It has a graceful and flower-like appearance, often found in lush gardens.

name: Morelull
description: Morelull is a dual-type Pokémon with Grass and Fairy attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It resembles a bioluminescent mushroom.

name: Shiinotic
description: Shiinotic is the evolved form of Morelull, now a dual-type Pokémon with Grass and Fairy attributes. It has a mystical and magical appearance, often found in dark forests.

name: Salandit
description: Salandit is a dual-type Pokémon with Poison and Fire attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It is known for its toxic abilities and devious nature.

name: Salazzle
description: Salazzle is the evolved form of Salandit, now a dual-type Pokémon with Poison and Fire attributes. It has a sultry and alluring appearance, often found in volcanic areas.

name: Stufful
description: Stufful is a dual-type Pokémon with Normal and Fighting attributes, the first stage of its evolutionary line. It appears as a cute and stuffed animal but has great strength.

name: Bewear
description: Bewear is the evolved form of Stufful, now a dual-type Pokémon with Normal and Fighting attributes. It retains a cuddly but immensely strong appearance, often surprising trainers with its power.
